title: IBM Unica Campaign Training and Certification Course Online
description: The Mindmajix IBM Unica Campaign training enables you to master all the concepts of this campaign management software right from the basics to advanced level with practical examples. This course will make you proficient in IBM Unica Campaign basics, data selection, and manipulation, data refinement and output, etc., through hands-on sessions with real-time use cases and projects. Enroll now and get certified.
prerequisites:
Who should take the IBM Unica Campaign training?




The IBM Unica Campaign training is designed for the following professionals:


Campaign Designers
Marketing Professionals
System Administrators
Professionals who want to explore their skill-set with the advanced technologies
instructor_bio: Sangeeth has got 10+ of years of industrial experience working for global MNCs. He chose to deliver online training and contribute informative articles and blogs to various websites to share his technical expertise.
